  • Method Details

    • getChosenPlanets

      public Map<Player,Integer> getChosenPlanets()
      Retrieves the map of players and their corresponding chosen planets.
      Overrides:
      getChosenPlanets in class AdventureCardState
      Returns:
      a map where each key is a Player object and the value is an Integer representing the chosen planet index for that player.

    • getAllPlanetsChosen

      public Boolean getAllPlanetsChosen()
      Checks whether all the planets have been chosen in the current state.
      Overrides:
      getAllPlanetsChosen in class AdventureCardState
      Returns:
      a Boolean indicating whether all planets are chosen. Returns true if all planets have been selected, otherwise false.

    • setAllPlanetsChosen

      public void setAllPlanetsChosen(Boolean allPlanetsChosen)
      Sets the state indicating whether all planets have been chosen.
      Overrides:
      setAllPlanetsChosen in class AdventureCardState
      Parameters:
      allPlanetsChosen - a Boolean value representing whether all planets are marked as chosen. Pass true if all planets are chosen, otherwise false.

    • getCurrPlayers

      public List<Player> getCurrPlayers()
      Retrieves the list of current players in the game state.
      Overrides:
      getCurrPlayers in class AdventureCardState
      Returns:
      a list of Player objects representing the players currently in the game state.

    • updateView

      public void updateView(View view, Game toDisplay) throws IOException
      Updates the given view with the current state of the provided game object.
      Overrides:
      updateView in class GameState
      Parameters:
      view - the view instance that should be updated
      toDisplay - the game object containing the state to render on the view
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs during the view update
